Actions.Name: Weight of Conscience
Actions.Description: The Aurelian marks a foe in range 5.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the foe cannot teleport and can only move a maximum of 3 spaces a round, no matter their abilities or speed. A foe can end this mark by not moving at all for their entire turn.

Actions.Name: Lift Burdens
Actions.Description: The Aurelian marks an ally in range 5.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the ally gains flying and evasion.

Actions.Name: Collect
Actions.Description: Every foe on the battlefield is reduced to 50% of their max hp and loses all vigor. If already bloodied, they are reduced to 25% hp instead and must save or become stunned.
